body:
Should add a new cost type {p*} to MagicCostManaType.
Such card is like "Act of Aggression", it let player cost with either mana or  2 life.
author: [neoedmund](https://code.google.com/u/neoedmund/)
title: Implement a new cost type {p*}

comments.body:
Thanks for the suggestion, we would definitely love to support Phyrexian mana, the hardest part for us is making sure the AI is able to handle this additional type of mana. Frankly, I'm not completely familiar with the mana paying logic so I'm not sure how hard it will be to do this. You are most welcome to submit patches.

**Labels:** -Type-Defect Type-Enhancement
